title: Support Ticket is taking forever.
body:
I send a ticket regards to my account on Tuesday at 18:04, but it still hasn't reply me
(I didn't bump the ticket or anything). Normally it only takes around 24 hour or little longer to reply, but its 3:16 which is about 45 hour from the time I send the ticket. I understand that sometimes it takes longer due to the huge amount of player and just that many support.

I created this post because the issue that I describe in the ticket is preventing me from playing league.{{champion:32}} Haven't play for 2days... I need LOL QWQ.

In the dark room, sitting in the corner and looking out into the window, waiting for a Riot angel to save me.

replies.body: Nooo, I want to help restore light to your world fam!  What's your ticket number?  I'll take a look to see what's going on.  Depending on the type of issue, it may be in a queue that's a bit backed up.  Happy to check just in case!

On Tuesday, the client told me a error, but I was able to login to my lv3 Account Ticket ID: 30551602.
On Wednesday, the client told me that the account was suspended and tell me to check the email, but I didn't receive anything regards to the issue.
Ticket ID: 30560169

Thank you so much and I appreciate the time and effort that your spending on me.{{item:3026}}

Thanks for the info!  So, there's some account sensitive stuff so I can't really offer much here on the boards.  Your ticket has been received, though, and I made sure it's going to the right place.  Hang tight and our specialists will respond as soon as they can!
